alert.note: Alert for Shasta; Tehama (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 19 at 6:17PM PDT until August 19 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Tehama County in northern California... Southwestern Shasta County in northern California... * Until 700 PM PDT. * At 616 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Platina, or near Yolla Bolly District, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter-size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Yolla Bolly District, Beegum, Knob and Platina. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
